trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Kansas City
There was one other sighting in Kansas City on or around July 11th 2010
Summary: Bright spot moving N to S changed color then winked out.
divs: sighting detailson sunday july 11th my son and i were outside looking at the milkyway and venus on the western horizon since it was a new moon and very clear. at the time stated we observed an extremely bright object moving from north to south at (compared to a regular aircrft) a rpid pace. it started as a bright spot and moved approx 15 to 30 degrees accross the sky from the north to the south. 8\10ths of way through our sighting it became a bright orange then faded to a dark pink color the simply dissappeared, although there was a dark object against the sky for a few seconds. what struck me as odd was the fact that it was completeley silent, had no type blinking anti-collision lights and the ease and speed which it cut through the sky. i was in aviation for 12 years and the military for 4 and have never seen anything even remotely close to what i saw that night and in my opinion it defied anything anything flying today.
